item.description:
Granite State Future is NH's own Agenda 21 implementers and they are having a listening session. I think we should stack the room and find out exactly what their plans are and let them know we are watching. Here's what happened at the Lakes Region session: http://www.nhteapartycoalition.org/tea/2013/03/09/how-do-you-crash-an-open-house-just-ask-the-nhtpc/

Rockingham Region Listening Session
Tue, May 14, 6pm â€“ 9pm
Sanborn Regional High School (cafeteria), 17 Danville Road, Kingston, NH
Register Online or by Calling NH Listens at 603.862.0692. http://tinyurl.com/RegisterListening
item.name: Granite State Future "Listening Session" (Rockingham Region)
